column3: Latest;Kep: A foreign national has died of a physical illness
column4: according to a police report. The death occurred on the night of November 8
column5: 2019 at a rented room in Keo Krasaing village
column7: the authorities visited the scene to investigate.------The Italian national was identified as Rodolfo Cecchi
column8: aged 63.------He rented a dormitory in Keo Krasang village and had a chronic illness for several months.------The source said the cops inspected the body carefully
column9: and after the examination they concluded that cause of death was chronic cirrhosis. ------KT
